alert.note: Alert for Santa Fe (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued March 04 at 5:21PM MST until March 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Central Santa Fe County in north central New Mexico... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 520 PM MST, an area of dust was along a line extending from near Tesuque to Madrid, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery and trained spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 264 and 295. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 274 and 290. Locations impacted include... Santa Fe, White Rock, Eldorado At Santa Fe, Cerrillos Hills State Park, Canada De Los Alamos, Lamy, Hyde Memorial State Park, Madrid, La Cienega and Galisteo. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
